News.headline: Sunday Football At The Daggers: 29th January
News.page_title: Sunday Football At The Daggers: 29th January
News.URL_keywords: Sunday Football At The Daggers: 29th January
News.short_description: Enjoy a packed Sunday of football at the Daggers Bar.
News.description:
Football Sundays will be back between 12:00-7:00pm on Sunday with two games from the Emirates FA Cup being shown live on BT Sport and BBC One. At 13:30pm Vanarama National league side Sutton United will be taking on Leeds United from the Championship at Gander Green Lane live on BT Sport, then Manchester United will play 2013 FA Cup winners Wigan Athletic at Old Trafford live on BBC One.

Take advantage of the Football Sundays offers on selected drinks at £2.49, which include; Carling, Cask Ale, Bottle Coors, Carling English Cider and Koppaberg. 

These offers are open to members only. Season ticket holders are automatically members but anyone wishing to buy a membership on the day can do so by asking a member of bar staff. So make sure you buy your membership for just £2!
